projects.name: UPSC Academia (Coaching Class Website)
projects.description: A specialized web application that integrates with the official university and government exam APIs (like UPSC, MPSC, BARTI). This platform enables students and prospective leads to quickly and reliably check real-time exam schedules, results, and class updates.
features: Real-Time Status: Fetches up-to-date exam schedules
User-Friendly Interface: Simple navigation for students to access notes

projects.name: College Inquiry Chatbot
projects.description: A web-based, AI-powered chatbot designed as a final year project to handle student college inquiries. It leverages NLP to provide accurate, context-aware information, significantly streamlining the query resolution process.
features: Intelligent Query Resolution: Uses Natural Language Processing (NLP) to understand context. Targeted Information: Provides specific answers for Brijlal Biyani Science College students. Web-Based Accessibility: Easy access via any standard web browser.

projects.name: Rail Sarthi PNR Checker
projects.description: A specialized web application that integrates with official Indian Railways APIs via OpenRouter. This tool enables users to quickly and reliably check the real-time reservation status (PNR status) of their railway tickets.
features: Real-Time PNR Status: Fetches up-to-date ticket confirmation details instantly. Official API Integration: Utilizes secure and official railway APIs for accurate data. User-Friendly Interface: Simple input for 10-digit PNR number results in fast retrieval.

projects.name: PDF2Word - Word2PDF
projects.description: A utility web application for seamless document format conversion. It allows users to convert PDF files into editable Word documents and vice versa, providing a quick solution for common file manipulation needs.
features: Bi-Directional Conversion: Supports both PDF to Word and Word to PDF conversions. Efficiency: Offers a fast and simple method for common file format changes. Pure Web Implementation: Runs entirely in the browser without requiring external software.

projects.name: Image Format Converter
projects.description: A versatile web utility designed to convert digital images between various file formats (e.g., JPG to PNG, PNG to JPG). This tool offers a simple interface for essential image manipulation tasks.
features: Multiple Format Support: Converts images across common formats like JPG
etc. Intuitive User Experience: Designed for simplicity and ease of use. Tailwind CSS Styling: Modern and responsive interface using Tailwind CSS framework.

projects.name: LOST & FOUND
projects.description: A user-friendly web dashboard designed to centralize the process of reuniting lost items with their owners within a specific geographic location (e.g., an office space or campus). It allows users to easily post details of lost or found items, streamlining item reporting
features: Allows users to post details and images of lost or found items
Search Functionality: Enables users to search for matching items using keywords and filters
Direct Communication: Facilitates contact between the finder and the owner for item retrieval
Centralized Management: Provides a unified platform for tracking and managing all reported lost and found items.
